p: Comorbidities such as hypertension, coronary heart disease or type 2 diabetes are additional risk factors for COVID-19 pathology and complications ( 71). These comorbidities are also considered to be aging-associated diseases. Current geroscience research aims at determining biological age and could help in the future to determine which older adults are most at risk for complication when infected by SARS-CoV-2. This approach is not specific to COVID-19, and it could be a benefic prevention to protect older adults against future epidemics.
